1370: Wijfgode was born in Scherbier straet in 1370.
Got married to Coppesoeten at age 16 in 1370.
Gave birth to Egbertus in 1370 at age 16.
Lost son Egbertus when Egbertus was 1 years old.
1372: Gave birth to Eelbout in 1372 at age 18.
1373: Gave birth to Breghlent in 1373 at age 19.
1377: Gave birth to Wolbrand in 1377 at age 23.
1378: Gave birth to Kornillis in 1378 at age 24.
1382: Gave birth to Lelien in 1382 at age 28.
1389: Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 8 years old.
